name: Soldier of Failure
description: Soldier of Failure is a simple 2D platformer with shooter elements. Imagine that there is a war. You play as a soldier whose main objective is the collection of weapons and destruction of enemy equipment.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: 1.2 Ghz+ Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 500MB DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 400 MB available space
